title: Can't login to Yandex mail
content:
trying to get email - got this error; How do I fix this?????????? Happening last few days.

my email: pizzipie@yandex.com

Sending of password for user pizzipie did not succeed. Mail server pop.yandex.com responded: [AUTH] login failure or POP3 disabled, try later. sc=75IVcg0DLKo0_290005_
creator: pizzipie1

title: Links to browser no longer work in Thunderbird.
content: Still waiting for help with my annoying thunderbird problem. Once you help me solve it, my donations will begin. The browser link in my incoming email stopped working about 3 months ago. I have to right click on the link, start my browser manually and paste the link. I've tried it with Firefox, Edge and Chrome (preferred) and none of them work.
creator: jimarch
